code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={recommend:null,newDisney:null,original:null,trending:null};var movieSlice=createSlice({name:"movie",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setMovies:function setMovies(state,action){state.recommend=action.payload.recommend;state.newDisney=action.payload.newDisney;state.original=action.payload.original;state.trending=action.payload.trending;}}});var setMovies=movieSlice.actions.setMovies;export{setMovies};export var selectRecommend=function selectRecommend(state){return state.movie.recommend;};export var selectNewDisney=function selectNewDisney(state){return state.movie.newDisney;};export var selectOriginal=function selectOriginal(state){return state.movie.original;};export var selectTrending=function selectTrending(state){return state.movie.trending;};export default movieSlice.reducer;
